titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of National Nurses Week, to be observed from May 6 through May 12, 2019.
A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of National Nurses Week, to be observed from May 6 through May 12, 2019.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary:
This resolution expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Nurses Week.
It also recognizes the contributions of nurses to the U.S. health care system.
